import{createSlice,configureStore}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";var initialState={user:""};var userSlice=createSlice({name:"user",initialState:initialState,reducers:{updateUser:function updateUser(state,action){state.user=action.payload;}}});//Create the store
var store=configureStore({reducer:userSlice.reducer});export var usersActions=userSlice.actions;export default store;
